item.title: Data: 30 minutes before WLFI TGE, 4 out of the Top 10 holders transferred a total of 1.86 billion WLFI to a CEX.
item.description: September 1st. On-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa) stated on social media that half an hour after the WLFI token generation event (TGE), four holders (TOP6/7/8/10) made a choice to sell some or all of their holdings partially. Meanwhile, the remaining six holders are still holding.It is reported that the holders who chose to sell all recharged their tokens into a trading platform instead of conducting on-chain transactions. These four holders have recharged a total of 1.86 billion WLFI, which accounts for 4% of the total holdings of the TOP 10 individual holders.

item.title: Three presale participation addresses received 160 million WLFI each, all of which were subsequently deposited into Binance.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by LookOnChain, three presale participant addresses collectively received 160 million WLFI tokens and deposited them all into Binance. The details are as follows:· The address 0xC3e7 received 60 million WLFI tokens (approximately $19.2 million).· The address 0x7ed4 received 53.33 million WLFI tokens (approximately $17.1 million).· The address 0x3881 received 46.67 million WLFI tokens (approximately $14.9 million).

item.title: WLFI: Users Can Now Use Chainlink for WLFI Token Cross-Chain
item.description: On September 1st, the official announcement of World Liberty Financial on social media indicated that users can now utilize the Chainlink CCIP Cross-Chain Bridge to swap WLFI tokens between Ethereum and Solana or between Ethereum and BSC.

item.title: Binance will list the WLFI standard contract, and existing positions will not be affected.
item.description: September 1st. According to official information, Binance Futures will start to gradually transform the pre-trading of the WLFI perpetual contract into standard trading at 21:00 Beijing time on September 1st, 2025. The conversion period may last up to 3 hours, which is subject to price fluctuations and the availability of the stability index price. During the conversion period, the trading of the WLFIUSDT perpetual contract and the existing positions will not be impacted, and it supports a leverage of up to 50 times.

item.title: WLFI Official Spends $1 Million USD to Buy 3.26 Million WLFI Tokens
item.description: On September 1st, based on Arkham data, the official address of World Liberty Financial spent 1 million US dollars to purchase 3.26 million WLFI tokens through a Cow transaction.

item.title: WLFI price is stable at $0.3, with a circulating market cap of $7.4 billion.
item.description: On September 1st, according to market data, following the official launch of the WLFI token, the current price on CEXs like HTX and on the Solana and Ethereum networks is temporarily steady around $0.3. Based on the officially announced initial circulating supply of 24.66 billion tokens, the market capitalization is currently reported to be $7.4 billion.

item.title: A certain Smart Money trading strategy, WLFI, made a profit of $263,000 within 10 minutes.
item.description: On September 1st, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a Smart Money address beginning with 6ccDoT achieved a profit of $263,866 by means of a Flash Loan within less than 10 minutes.

item.title: OKX will list LINEA (Linea) Perpetual Swap Trading in the Pre-market Trading section.
item.description: On September 1st, OKX is going to list LINEA perpetual swap trading. The trading will commence on September 1, 2025, at 10:00 PM (UTC+8).

item.title: The WLFI Coin Price on Gate Witnesses Steep Decline, Currently on Par with the Solana Blockchain
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the price of WLFI on Gate has witnessed a significant decrease. Currently, it is on a par with the Solana network and reached a peak of 1.1 US dollars at one time.

item.title: WLFI opened at $0.46 on HTX, and is now trading at $0.31.
item.description: On September 1st, based on HTX market data, WLFI opened at $0.46 on HTX and is currently trading at $0.31.
